00058     class ConnectionState : public ReferenceCount {
00059     public:
00060       bool                connected;
00061       struct sockaddr_in  addr;
00062       struct sockaddr_in  localAddr;
00063       time_t              timeout;
00064       DispatchHandlerPtr  handlerPtr;

00066       boost::condition    cond;

00068       std::string         serviceName;
00069     };
00070     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ConnectionState> ConnectionStatePtr;
00071 
00072 
00073     struct ltConnectionState {
00074       bool operator()(const ConnectionStatePtr &cs1, const ConnectionStatePtr &cs2) const {
00075         return xtime_cmp(cs1->nextRetry, cs2->nextRetry) >= 0;
00076       }
00077     };
00078 
00079     typedef struct {
00080       Comm              *comm;
00081       boost::mutex       mutex;
00082       boost::condition   retryCond;
00083       boost::thread     *thread;
00084       SockAddrMapT<ConnectionStatePtr>  connMap;
00085       std::priority_queue<ConnectionStatePtr, std::vector<ConnectionStatePtr>, ltConnectionState> retryQueue;
00086       bool quietMode;
00087     } SharedImplT;
00088 
00094     ConnectionManager(Comm *comm) {
00095       m_impl = new SharedImplT;
00096       m_impl->comm = comm;
00097       m_impl->thread = new boost::thread(*this);
00098       m_impl->quietMode = false;
00099     }
00100 
00104     ConnectionManager(const ConnectionManager &cm) {
00105       m_impl = cm.m_impl;
00106       intrusive_ptr_add_ref(this);
00107     }
